sentence.Network_en: The memory of the broken - backed dog rose in his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又回想起那只被Pryrates踏碎了脊背的狗.

sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: I heard the engines revving as the lorries backed and turned.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡车倒车和掉头的时候，我听见发动机的轰鸣声。
